content: असंबद्ध {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Unconnected, incoherent. {@--2@} Nonsensical, absurd, unmeaning; °प्रलापिणी talking nonsense; असंबद्धः खल्वसि <ls>Mk. 9</ls> absurd fellow; °मनोरथा <ls>Māl. 2</ls>; °द्धं प्रलपितुं प्रवृत्तः <ls>Ratn. 2.</ls> {@--3@} Improper, wrong; <ls>Ms. 12. 6.</ls> --द्धं An absurd sentence, unmeaning or nonsensical speech; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} यावज्जीवमहं मौनी when uttered by some one; see अबद्ध also.
